duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care services in accordance with nursing standards and facility policies.
Stay current with behavioural intervention training and apply it when necessary.
Maintain electronic medical records and use computer programs for documentation.
Serve as a patient advocate and ensure their care needs are met.
Interpret nursing and facility policies and procedures accurately.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree in Nursing from an accredited college, with a license to practice nursing in the State of Indiana as a Registered Nurse, and a current CPR certification. Additional knowledge and/or ability may be required based on the population the facility serves.
